science.name: Science
science.description: You have a natural curiosity about the world and how things work. Your analytical mind and attention to detail make you well-suited for scientific research and discovery.

technology.name: Technology
technology.description: You have a logical mind and enjoy solving complex problems using technology. Your ability to think systematically makes you ideal for roles in the tech industry.

engineering.name: Engineering
engineering.description: You have a practical mindset and enjoy building and designing things. Your problem-solving skills and creativity make you well-suited for engineering roles.

mathematics.name: Mathematics
mathematics.description: You have a strong analytical mind and enjoy working with numbers and abstract concepts. Your attention to detail and logical thinking make you ideal for mathematical careers.

arts.name: Arts
arts.description: You have a creative mind and enjoy expressing yourself through various media. Your imagination and aesthetic sense make you well-suited for artistic and creative roles.

business.name: Business
business.description: You have strong organizational and interpersonal skills. Your ability to lead and make strategic decisions makes you well-suited for business and management roles.
